name: R.P.S. Knockout Free - Fast Paced Rock Paper Scissors Action
name_original: R.P.S. Knockout Free - Fast Paced Rock Paper Scissors Action
description:
Do you ever want to play Rock Paper Scissors and see how often you can win? Than this game is for you!

To play this game you have to be quick witted and even quicker to the draw. Rock Paper Scissors is a classic game that people of all ages enjoy since his childhoud, thats why this could be the right game for you.

Features:
-Easy to play
-Good for all ages

This is the free version with a few ads - You can find the ad free version in the store.
